mapper.select: SELECT reservation.*, room.room_id room_id, room.loc loc, room.price room_price, room.latitude latitude, room.longitude longitude, member.id id, member.phone phone, room_option.room_option_id room_option_id, room_option.room_type room_type, room_option.max_number max_number, room_option.detail detail, workation_option.workation_option_id workation_option_id, workation_option.workation_name workation_name, service_option.service_option_id service_option_id, service_option.service_name service_name FROM reservation JOIN room ON reservation.room_id=room.room_id JOIN member ON reservation.id = member.id JOIN room_option ON reservation.room_option_id = room_option.room_option_id JOIN workation_option ON reservation.workation_option_id = workation_option.workation_option_id JOIN service_option ON reservation.service_option_id = service_option.service_option_id WHERE reservation.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
